sec.p: To analyze the content of total flavonoids, 100 µL of Syzygium aromaticum essential oil prepared in ethanol or 100 µL of Argan oil were mixed with sodium nitrite (5%) and 150 µL of Alcl 3 solution 10%, 200 µL of NaOH (1%) 1M was added after 5 min, absorbance of the reaction mixture was measured at 510 nm, the tests were made in triplicate, and quercetine was used as reference [ 49].
